name: National Test For Identification Of Dangerous Phenomenons
name_original: National Test For Identification Of Dangerous Phenomenons
description:
Story: 

You live in a small town in the north of the USA. Going to go home after work once again, your boss hands you a disk with a test, which, according to him, every resident of this city must pass. You come home and run what you were given on the disk…

Update 1.1:

>Added points that are awarded for correct answers

>Added new part 

>Other minor changes
